reports.title: KEMSA COVID-19 Funds Scandal
reports.description: Audit reveals KEMSA irregularly awarded tenders worth billions for COVID-19 supplies. Several officials implicated in procurement irregularities. Loss of public funds estimated at KSh 7.8 billion.

reports.title: NYS Scandal Phase 2
reports.description: Fresh audit shows KSh 9 billion lost through fictitious invoices and ghost projects. Several senior government officials implicated. Case currently in court.

reports.title: Galana Kulalu Irrigation Project
reports.description: KSh 7.2 billion project stalled despite massive investment. Only 10,000 acres developed instead of planned 1 million. Farmers left without water.

reports.title: Gold Smuggling at JKIA
reports.description: Investigation reveals gold worth billions smuggled through JKIA with alleged collusion of customs officials. Dubai-based traders implicated.

reports.title: KPLC Transformer Scandal
reports.description: KSh 400 million lost in procurement of faulty transformers. Several senior managers charged in court. Power blackouts persist.

reports.title: County Ward Fund Misuse
reports.description: Auditor General reports KSh 1.2 billion ward funds unaccounted for. Projects not implemented as planned. Residents protest poor services.

reports.title: Thwake Dam Delays
reports.description: KSh 80 billion dam project behind schedule by 3 years. Contractor disputes blamed. Water shortage persists in lower Eastern.

reports.title: Sugar Importation Scandal
reports.description: Illegal sugar imports with high mercury content discovered. Several companies implicated in tax evasion. Health concerns raised.

reports.title: NHIF Fraud Scheme
reports.description: Investigation reveals KSh 5 billion lost through fraudulent claims by hospitals. Fake patients and procedures reported. Several arrests made.

reports.title: County Revenue Leakage
reports.description: Audit shows KSh 3 billion county revenue unaccounted for. Cash collected but not banked. Several revenue clerks suspended.

reports.title: Bribed Officer
reports.description:
Demanded a bribe from me for driving without carrying my driver's licence.


  1. Why
  2. How?
